alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Lee; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Moore, west central Lee and southwestern Chatham Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carthage, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail and localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Goldston, Harpers Crossroads, Highfalls, Hasty and Glendon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
